entry.title: 64 bit arithmetic soft fork
entry.summary: The upcoming Bitcoin Core PR review club session is scheduled for March 20, 2024, at 17:00 UTC. This session will focus on a specific implementation, detailed at [this link](https://bitcoincore.reviews/29221). The organizer of the session has expressed a willingness to address any inquiries related to the pull request (PR), with a particular emphasis on discussing the 'Design Questions' section, which appears to have unresolved issues. The invitation is extended to interested individuals, with the hope that many will join the discussion at the specified time.
